snippet: Mr. Banisadr’s paintings usually depict epic battles between vast imperial forces, with banners fluttering overhead and bloody skirmishes below.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews paintings by Ali Banisadr at Sperone Westwater gallery.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Banisadr’s paintings usually depict epic battles between vast imperial forces, with banners fluttering overhead and bloody skirmishes below.
